name: Hot Air Balloon Ride in Masai Mara: Takeoff, Sunrise, Animals, Landing
description:
This is one of the most magical experiences of my life. 

Join me on this adventure hot air ballooning in the Masai Mara. This hot air balloon ride was my first and if you watch this video, I think you'll agree it was a very special experience. Hot air ballooning in the Masai Mara has been a dream of mine for a long time and getting to experience it was incredible.

This hot air balloon ride in the Masai Mara includes the preparation, takeoff, sunrise, animals, and the landing. Every single second of this hot air balloon ride was amazing!

Have you been on a Hot Air Balloon Ride in Masai Mara?

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel!
https://www.youtube.com/jebbrooksflies

Check me out on Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/jebbrooks/

And don't forget to take a look at my travel blog:
https://greenergrass.com/

Music:
Floating Away - Henrik Neesgaard;
Floating Forward - Gunnar Johnsen; 
Floating Downstream - Stefan Downstream; and
Floating Hearts - Julyan Brynn
All music from Epidemic Sound
